txt.en: You have recovered a chunk of rotten wolf-flesh from one of the many wolves in the Murderous Pit. The flesh is torn by wolf-teeth, only further supporting the notion that the wolves have begun to feed on each other in desperation.\n\nAll of the wolves that have feasted on the fallen appear to be developing a vicious disease. In order to cull this disease and safe-guard Stangard, you decide it would be best to burn the fallen wolves in the den.
'These wolves have become very dangerous in desperation... a disease would make them even more of a threat. Your initiative has served well. You have my thanks.'
Fallen wolves in the wolf-den are showing signs of a vicious disease spread from devouring their kin.
Wolf-corpses can be found scattered about the Murderous Pit.\n\nYou should burn the wolf-corpses to prevent the disease from spreading.
Brifard can be found at the camp to the west, just outside of Thinglad.\n\nYou should return to Brifard and inform him of your discovery.
